name: Infinitely up: Skip Figure
detailed_description:
Description

Infinitely up: Skip Figure - this is a physical puzzle, where you have to build a tower from different shapes that are randomly issued. The difficulty of the game is that if even one piece falls, you lose. Some figures are not so universal and sometimes may not suit your construction, so you have to think tactically and work out your own strategy to fit the figure and not drop it. You can use a certain ability and skip a figure to use a random following, but after that you will need to put at least one figure to use the ability again. Use your ingenuity and approach the construction outside the box, then success awaits you. How high can you build a tower?

Features:

- Minimalistic style

- A variety of shapes

- Interesting and addictive gameplay

- Pleasant music
